ej,perrr101,C,davib902,Yelling at umpire Dodgers coach Ron Perranoski stood on the top of the dugout steps Waving his arms to get the attention of catcher Rick Dempsey after the first pitch to Willie McGee; HP Bob Davidson yelled at Perranoski who yelled back and was ejected by Davidson; when Perranoski ran onto the field, Dodgers manager Tommy Lasorda followed and then walked pitcher Alejandro Pena back to the mound; since Perranoski had already talked with Pena during McGee's at bat, this was an illegal mound visit; however, with all the commotion at HP, no umpire saw it until after; once McGee made an out, the Dodgers were forced to change pitchers
